name: WAR ON THE STREET
description:
GENERAL


WAR ON THE STREET is a top-down shooter game in which you have to fight a group of terrorists occupying the streets of Zamir.

You are Special Agent N, who has excellent physical and psychological training, excellent handling of any kind of weapon. Your superiors sent you to the city to conduct a special anti-terrorist operation, clear the city of terrorists and get out of there alive, this will help you numerous arsenal of weapons scattered around the city.

Incredible Atmosphere, Great Music, lots of fun with lots of weapons.
The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.

Features

  • Variety of weapons
  • Beautiful animations
  • Nice lowpoly graphics
  • Relaxing and fun gameplay
  • Pleasant atmosphere.
